markdown:
| icon           = poe2 huana_tablet icon.png
| description    = A'm nae aught to be bragging needless now, but 'tis important that a keep conne how full of life, strong, and devout Yseyr wis, an for a Berathian priest. Thegither, by his side, in glorious battles fought to Berath's honor, a gutted countless undead wit my spear. For nearhaund twinty years, Yseyr fought to keep shut the gates of Hel. Surely, thay will crash open wit his passin.

Losh, Borthwn, Laird of Heldengate
